about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Overview


Welcome to Pocketing the ball—a true billiard simulation experience that allows players to enjoy the classic game of 8-ball pool in a virtual world. Whether you're a pool enthusiast or looking for a relaxing game, this 3D billiard game is the perfect choice. With detailed graphics and a realistic physics engine, we offer players an experience akin to being in a real billiard hall. Players can practice alone or face off in battle.

Realistic 3D Graphics: High-quality 3D graphics and smooth animations provide an immersive gaming experience.

Accurate Physics Engine: Realistically simulates the physical behavior of billiards, including collisions, spins, and trajectories, making every shot challenging.

Multiple Game Modes: Includes training mode and battle games, meeting the needs of different players.

Customization Options: Players can customize their cue sticks


With a carefully designed user interface and intuitive controls, players can easily get started and enjoy the fun of the game. We've also added concise tutorials to help beginners quickly understand the game rules and methods of operation. In addition, specific game mechanics, such as control of the striking force and rotation of the ball, are presented to players through intuitive graphics, ensuring you can precisely control every shot.
